main event: A round green object was observed sinking towards the horizon in Kingston, Massachusetts, on April 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object had a spark trail upon disappearance., The observation lasted 3 minutes., The sighting was categorized as a ground visual observation., Scientists from the Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory reported an extremely bright meteor in the area at the time of the sighting., The object was moving slowly westward before sinking into the horizon.
witness description: Mrs. M, a legal secretary from Winter Street, Kingston, Massachusetts
